price: (3) How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.
arabic: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ فَنَادَواْ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin fanādaw walāta ḥīna manāṣin
